Plot

Beautiful Mayumi (Manami Higa) enlists the help of Yataro Sarumaru (Hayato Ichihara) - a master locksmith and a notorious womanizer - to open a bank safe deposit box. This results in Yataro fleeing from the police who are in hot pursuit ...

Notes

Adapted from Naoki Serizawa's manga "Saru Lock".
Filming began October 30th and is expected to be complete in the middle of November.
Saru Lock The Movie will be released on February 27th, 2010 on 250 screens nationwide.
